text: Nameparasted ƣajri Allohi jakto, magar ʙutonero, ki xud va padaronaton onhoro ʙa nomhoe xondaed (ja'ne, on ʙuthoro ma'ʙudoni xud xondaed) va Alloh huccate ʙar sihati va isʙoti onho nozil nakardaast. Hukm, cuz hukmi Alloh nest. Farmon dodaast, ki cuz Uro naparasted. In ast dini rostu ustuvor, vale ʙestari mardum haqiqati onro namedonand
